channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Remove menu for home tele?
channel.description: I feel that its annoying and redundant that when u click on the home tele to tele home, there is an option, do u wanna tele home or never mind, how do i just make it tele home instead of having a menu asking the same thing...

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Remove menu for home tele?
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

THANK YOU! FIXED

Read full topic

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Remove menu for home tele?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In ClickingButtons.java find the home teleport button ID (75010 <That’s the ID in my server) and it should say something like:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(int, int);
break;

the words ‘int’ are obviously numbers.
Change it to:

c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.RESPAWN_X, Config.RESPAWN_Y, 0, “modern”);
break;

That’ll make you teleport to what ever the coords are in Config.java (Assuming you have them) and it’ll have the modern spell teleport look.

Read full topic
